<title level="1" right="Cantrip 1" pfs="Standard">[Discern Secrets](/Spells.aspx?ID=796)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cantrip" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=22" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Hex" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=324" />
<trait label="Witch" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=323" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 238 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Patron Theme**
[Rune](/Patrons.aspx?ID=6)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Single Action" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** sustained up to 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You call upon your patron's power to better uncover secrets. When you Cast the Spell, the target can [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26), [Seek](/Actions.aspx?ID=84), or [Sense Motive](/Actions.aspx?ID=85). The target gains a +1 status bonus to the skill or Perception used for the roll, and this bonus remains as long as you Sustain the Spell. The target is temporarily immune to _discern secrets_ for 1 minute.

---
**Heightened (5th)** You can target two creatures instead of one.
name: Discern Secrets
